trans-unit.source: This command is commonly used to mark specific packages to be held from being upgraded, that is, to be kept at a certain version. When a state is changed to anything but being held, then it is typically followed by apt-get -u dselect-upgrade.

trans-unit.source: This does the same thing as modify(), but with a simpler interface. Instead of taking a list of directives, it takes a before and after view of an entry, determines the differences between the two, computes the directives, and executes them.
trans-unit.target: 这样做和 modify() ，只是接口更简单。它不使用指令列表，而是使用条目的前后视图，确定两者之间的差异，计算指令并执行它们。

trans-unit.source: This does the same thing as vagrant.stop. Other-VM control modules use "stop" and "shutdown" to differentiate between hard and soft shutdowns.
trans-unit.target: 这和vagrant.stop的作用是一样的。其他VM控制模块使用 "stop "和 "shutdown "来区分硬关机和软关机。

trans-unit.source: This endpoint accepts either a username, password, eauth trio, or a token kwarg and does not make use of sessions at all.
trans-unit.target: 此端点可以接受一个 username ， password ， eauth 三人，或一个 token kwarg，并在所有不使用的会话。

trans-unit.source: This endpoint is used with a check that is of the TTL type. When this is called, the status of the check is set to critical and the TTL clock is reset.
trans-unit.target: 这个端点与TTL类型的检查一起使用。当调用该端点时,检查的状态被设置为临界,TTL时钟被重置。

trans-unit.source: This endpoint is used with a check that is of the TTL type. When this is called, the status of the check is set to passing and the TTL clock is reset.
trans-unit.target: 这个端点与TTL类型的检查一起使用。当这个端点被调用时,检查的状态被设置为通过,TTL时钟被重置。

trans-unit.source: This endpoint is used with a check that is of the TTL type. When this is called, the status of the check is set to warning and the TTL clock is reset.
trans-unit.target: 这个端点与TTL类型的检查一起使用。当这个端点被调用时,检查的状态被设置为警告,TTL时钟被重置。

trans-unit.source: This engine sends events calls to the event stream without authenticating them in salt. Authentication will need to be configured and enforced on the irc server or enforced in the irc channel. trans-unit.source: This even works with include + extend so that you can override the default configured arguments by including the salt file and then extend the stateconf.set states that come from the included salt file. (IMPORTANT: Both the included and the extending sls files must use the stateconf renderer for this ``extend`` to work!)
trans-unit.target: 这甚至可以与 include + extend 一起使用,因此您可以通过包含salt文件来覆盖默认配置的参数，然后 extend 来自包含的salt文件的 stateconf.set 状态。（重要：包含的sls文件和扩展的sls文件都必须使用stateconf渲染器才能使此``扩展''起作用！）

trans-unit.source: This example maps all Pillar environments starting with dev- to dev-datacenter whereas Pillar environment like eu-prod will be mapped to prod-datacenter-eu.
trans-unit.target: 此示例将所有以 dev- 开头的Pillar环境映射到 dev-datacenter ,而将诸如 eu-prod 之类的Pillar环境映射到 prod-datacenter-eu 。

trans-unit.source: This example shows multiple groups applying to different users, with all users having access to run test.ping. Keep in mind that when using *, the value must be quoted, or else PyYAML will fail to load the configuration.
trans-unit.target: 此示例显示了适用于不同用户的多个组，所有用户都有权运行test.ping。请记住，使用 * 时，必须用引号将其引起来，否则PyYAML将无法加载配置。

trans-unit.source: This example uses a single group called default. In addition, other groups are being loaded from pillar data. The group names do not have any significance, it is the users and commands defined within them that are used to determine whether the Slack user has permission to run the desired command.
trans-unit.target: 本示例使用一个名为 default 的组。此外，正在从支柱数据加载其他组。组名没有任何意义，而是用户和其中定义的命令用于确定Slack用户是否有权运行所需的命令。

trans-unit.target: 这个例子将允许改变文件状态,但会限制trafficserver服务重启的并发量为4。

trans-unit.target: 这个例子将指示所有Salt的小弟从与他们的os grain同名的目录中下载vimrc,并将其复制到/etc/vimrc。

trans-unit.source: This execution module was designed to be able to handle connections both to a vCenter Server, as well as to an ESXi host. It utilizes the pyVmomi Python library and the ESXCLI package to run remote execution functions against either the defined vCenter server or the ESXi host.
trans-unit.target: 这个执行模块被设计成既能处理与vCenter服务器的连接,也能处理与ESXi主机的连接。它利用pyVmomi Python库和ESXCLI包来对定义的vCenter服务器或ESXi主机运行远程执行函数。

trans-unit.source: This execution module was designed to handle connections to a Cisco UCS server. This module adds support to send connections directly to the device through the rest API.
trans-unit.target: 该执行模块旨在处理与Cisco UCS服务器的连接。该模块增加了通过 rest API 直接向设备发送连接的支持。

trans-unit.source: This execution module was designed to handle connections to a Palo Alto based firewall. This module adds support to send connections directly to the device through the XML API or through a brokered connection to Panorama.
trans-unit.target: 该执行模块旨在处理与基于Palo Alto的防火墙的连接。该模块增加了通过XML API或通过与Panorama的中介连接直接向设备发送连接的支持。

trans-unit.source: This external pillar can pull attributes from objects in vCenter or an ESXi host and provide those attributes as pillar data to minions. This can allow for pillar based targeting of minions on ESXi host, Datastore, VM configuration, etc. This setup requires only the salt master have access to the vCenter server/ESXi hosts.
trans-unit.target: 这个外部支柱可以从vCenter或ESXi主机中的对象中提取属性,并将这些属性作为支柱数据提供给minions。这可以允许在ESXi主机、Datastore、虚拟机配置等方面对minions进行基于支柱的定位。这种设置要求只有盐主才能访问vCenter服务器/ESXi主机。

trans-unit.source: This facilitates the context where both types are required for the same subject
trans-unit.target: 这就方便了同一主题需要这两种类型的场合

trans-unit.source: This feature is not recommended to be used in production. It should be used for testing only!
trans-unit.target: 此功能不建议在生产中使用。它应该只用于测试!

trans-unit.target: 然后抓取这个文件,如果它有模板设置,就会用salt.files.utils.copyfile()将文件渲染到系统的正确位置。

trans-unit.source: This fileserver back-end is only compatible with MD5 ETag hashes in the S3 metadata. This means that you must use SSE-S3 or plaintext for bucket encryption, and that you must not use multipart upload when uploading to your bucket. More information here: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/API/RESTCommonResponseHeaders.html
trans-unit.target: 此文件服务器后端仅与S3元数据中的MD5 ETag哈希兼容。这意味着您必须使用SSE-S3或纯文本进行存储桶加密，并且在上传到存储桶时一定不能使用分段上传。此处更多信息：https : //docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/API/RESTCommonResponseHeaders.html

trans-unit.source: This fileserver back-end requires the use of the MD5 hashing algorithm. MD5 may not be compliant with all security policies.
trans-unit.target: 该文件服务器后端需要使用MD5散列算法。MD5可能不符合所有安全策略。

trans-unit.source: This fileserver backend serves files from the Master's local filesystem. If fileserver_backend is not defined in the Master config file, then this backend is enabled by default. If it is defined then roots must be in the fileserver_backend list to enable this backend.
trans-unit.target: 该文件服务器后端提供来自主服务器本地文件系统的文件。如果在主配置文件中未定义 fileserver_backend ，则默认情况下启用此后端。如果已定义，则 roots 必须在 fileserver_backend 列表中才能启用此后端。

trans-unit.source: This fileserver has an additional option hgfs_branch_method that will set the desired branch method. Possible values are: branches, bookmarks, or mixed. If using branches or mixed, the default branch will be mapped to base.
trans-unit.target: 该文件服务器还有一个附加选项 hgfs_branch_method ，它将设置所需的分支方法。可能的值为： branches ， bookmarks 或 mixed 。如果使用 branches 或 mixed 分支，则 default 分支将映射到 base 。

trans-unit.source: This fileserver supports two modes of operation for the buckets:
trans-unit.target: 该文件服务器支持两种桶的操作模式。

trans-unit.source: This function accepts the same arguments as docker.create, with the exception of start. In addition, it accepts the arguments from docker.logs, with the exception of follow, to control how logs are returned. Finally, the bg argument described below can be used to optionally run the container in the background (the default behavior is to block until the container exits).
trans-unit.target: 此函数接受与 docker.create 相同的参数，但 start 除外。此外，它还接受来自参数 docker.logs ，与外 follow ，以控制日志如何返回。最后，下面描述的 bg 参数可用于有选择地在后台运行容器（默认行为是阻塞，直到容器退出）。

trans-unit.source: This function does not process commands through a shell unless the python_shell argument is set to True. This means that any shell-specific functionality such as 'echo' or the use of pipes, redirection or &&, should either be migrated to cmd.shell or have the python_shell=True flag set here.
trans-unit.target: 除非 python_shell 参数设置为 True ,否则此函数不会通过外壳处理命令。这意味着任何特定于外壳的功能（例如“ echo”或使用管道，重定向或&&）都应迁移到cmd.shell或在此处设置python_shell = True标志。

trans-unit.source: This function has changed for version 0.17.0. In prior versions, the cwd and template arguments must be specified, with the source directories/files coming as a space-separated list at the end of the command. Beginning with 0.17.0, sources must be a comma-separated list, and the cwd and template arguments are optional.
trans-unit.target: 对于版本0.17.0，此功能已更改。在以前的版本中，必须指定 cwd 和 template 参数，并且源目录/文件在命令末尾以空格分隔。从0.17.0开始， sources 必须是逗号分隔的列表，并且 cwd 和 template 参数是可选的。

trans-unit.target: 这个函数只针对绑定的ipaddress:port:hostheader组合进行验证,即使绑定已经以不同的配置存在,也会返回True。它不会修改现有绑定的配置。

trans-unit.source: This function return the routes from the RIB. In case the destination prefix is too short, there may be too many routes matched. Therefore in cases of devices having a very high number of routes it may be necessary to adjust the prefix length and request using a longer prefix.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数返回RIB中的路由。如果目标前缀太短,可能会有太多的路由匹配。因此,如果设备的路由数量非常多,可能需要调整前缀长度,并要求使用较长的前缀。

trans-unit.source: This function sends the commands to the device using the nodes transport. This is a lower layer function that shouldn't normally need to be used, preferring instead to use config() or enable().
trans-unit.target: 此功能使用节点传输将命令发送到设备。这是通常不应该使用的较低层函数，而是更喜欢使用 config() 或 enable() 。

trans-unit.source: This function should mainly be used as a helper for runner modules, in order to avoid redundant code. For example, when inside a runner one needs to execute a certain function on arbitrary groups of minions, only has to:

trans-unit.source: This function should not be used asynchronously for SELECTs -- it will not return anything and we don't currently have a mechanism for handling a future that will return results.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数不应该异步用于selects--它不会返回任何东西,而且我们目前没有处理未来会返回结果的机制。

trans-unit.source: This function supports all arguments for network and IPAM pool configuration which are available for the release of docker-py installed on the minion. For that reason, the arguments described below in the NETWORK CONFIGURATION ARGUMENTS and IP ADDRESS MANAGEMENT (IPAM) sections may not accurately reflect what is available on the minion. The docker.get_client_args function can be used to check the available arguments for the installed version of docker-py (they are found in the network_config and ipam_config sections of the return data), but Salt will not prevent a user from attempting to use an argument which is unsupported in the release of Docker which is installed. In those cases, network creation be attempted but will fail.
trans-unit.target: 该函数支持所有用于网络和IPAM池配置的参数，这些参数可用于安装在奴才上的docker-py版本中。因此，以下在网络配置参数和IP地址管理（IPAM）部分中描述的参数可能无法准确反映该服务器上的可用参数。该 docker.get_client_args 功能可用于检查泊坞窗-PY的安装版本可用的参数（他们在被发现 network_config 和 ipam_config 返回数据部分），但Salt不会阻止用户尝试使用已安装的Docker版本中不支持的参数。在这些情况下，将尝试创建网络，但将失败。

trans-unit.source: This function supports networks with either IPv4, or both IPv4 and IPv6. If configuring IPv4, then you can pass the IPAM arguments as shown below, as individual arguments on the Salt CLI. However, if configuring IPv4 and IPv6, the arguments must be passed as a list of dictionaries, in the ipam_pools argument. See the CLI Examples below. These docs also have more information on these arguments.
trans-unit.target: 此功能支持具有IPv4或IPv4和IPv6的网络。如果配置了IPv4，则可以将如下所示的IPAM参数作为Salt CLI上的各个参数进行传递。但是，如果配置IPv4和IPv6，则必须在 ipam_pools 参数中将参数作为字典列表传递。请参阅下面的CLI示例。这些文档还提供了有关这些参数的更多信息。

trans-unit.source: This function takes a list of database results and iterates over, merging them into a dict form.
trans-unit.target: 该函数接收一个数据库结果列表,并对其进行迭代,将其合并为一个dict形式。

trans-unit.source: This function translates Salt CLI or SLS input into the format which docker-py expects. However, in the event that Salt's translation logic fails (due to potential changes in the Docker Remote API, or to bugs in the translation code), this argument can be used to exert granular control over which arguments are translated and which are not.
trans-unit.target: 此功能将Salt CLI或SLS输入转换为docker-py期望的格式。但是，如果Salt的翻译逻辑失败（由于Docker Remote API的潜在更改或翻译代码中的错误），则可以使用此参数对要翻译的参数和不翻译的参数施加粒度控制。

trans-unit.source: This function translates Salt CLI or SLS input into the format which docker-py expects. However, in the event that Salt's translation logic fails (due to potential changes in the Docker Remote API, or to bugs in the translation code), this argument can be used to exert granular control over which arguments are translated and which are not.
trans-unit.target: 该函数将Salt CLI或SLS输入翻译成docker-py所期望的格式,但如果Salt的翻译逻辑失败(由于Docker Remote API的潜在变化或翻译代码的错误),该参数可以用来对哪些参数进行细化控制。然而,如果Salt的翻译逻辑失败(由于Docker Remote API的潜在变化,或者翻译代码中的错误),这个参数可以用来对哪些参数被翻译,哪些不被翻译进行精细控制。

trans-unit.source: This function translates Salt SLS input into the format which docker-py expects. However, in the event that Salt's translation logic fails (due to potential changes in the Docker Remote API, or to bugs in the translation code), this argument can be used to exert granular control over which arguments are translated and which are not.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数将Salt SLS输入翻译成docker-py期望的格式。然而,如果Salt的翻译逻辑失败(由于Docker Remote API的潜在变化,或者翻译代码中的错误),这个参数可以用来对哪些参数被翻译,哪些不被翻译进行精细控制。

trans-unit.source: This function uses the 'keys' from the 'vault' configuration to unseal vault server
trans-unit.target: 该功能使用 "vault "配置中的 "keys "来解封vault服务器。

trans-unit.source: This function uses the docker.compare_container_networks minion config option to determine which keys to examine. This provides flexibility in the event that features added in a future Docker release necessitate changes to how Salt compares networks. In these cases, rather than waiting for a new Salt release one can just set docker.compare_container_networks.
trans-unit.target: 该函数使用 docker.compare_container_networks minion config选项来确定要检查的密钥。如果将来的Docker版本中添加的功能需要更改Salt比较网络的方式，这将提供灵活性。在这些情况下， docker.compare_container_networks 等待新的Salt版本，只需设置docker.compare_container_networks即可。

trans-unit.source: This function will only provide results for XZ-compressed archives if the xz CLI command is available, as Python does not at this time natively support XZ compression in its tarfile module. Keep in mind however that most Linux distros ship with xz already installed.
trans-unit.target: 如果xz CLI命令可用，则此功能将仅提供XZ压缩存档的结果，因为Python目前在其tarfile模块中本机不支持XZ压缩。但是请记住，大多数Linux发行版均已安装xz。

trans-unit.target: 如果在传统的(即非无主的)奴仆上执行该函数,将引发一个错误。

trans-unit.source: This function will remove all data associated with the container. It will not, however, remove the btrfs subvolumes created by pulling container images (nspawn.pull_raw, nspawn.pull_tar, nspawn.pull_dkr).

trans-unit.source: This function will return a dictionary showing a list of environments which were cleared for each backend. An empty return dictionary means that no changes were made.

trans-unit.source: This grain is set by the NAPALM grain module only when running in a proxy minion. When Salt is installed directly on the network device, thus running a regular minion, the host grain provides the physical hostname of the network device, as it would be on an ordinary minion server. When running in a proxy minion, host points to the value configured in the pillar: NAPALM proxy module.
trans-unit.target: 仅当在代理minion中运行时，此颗粒才由NAPALM颗粒模块设置。如果将Salt直接安装在网络设备上，从而运行常规的minion，则 host 粒度将提供网络设备的物理主机名，就像在普通minion服务器上一样。在代理minion中运行时， host 指向在支柱： NAPALM proxy module 配置的值。

trans-unit.source: This inputs all the information needed to start a Vagrant VM. These settings are stored in a Salt sdb database on the Vagrant host minion and used to start, control, and query the guest VMs. The salt_id assigned here is the key field for that database and must be unique.
trans-unit.target: 输入启动Vagrant虚拟机所需的所有信息。这些设置存储在Vagrant主机minion上的Salt数据库中,用于启动、控制和查询访客虚拟机。这里分配的salt_id是该数据库的关键字段,必须是唯一的。

trans-unit.source: This is convenient for setting up autoscaling as follows. First specify a boto_asg.present state for an ASG with scaling_policies, and then set up boto_cloudwatch_alarm.present states which have alarm_actions that reference the scaling_policy.
trans-unit.target: 这对于设置自动缩放很方便,具体如下。首先为ASG指定一个带有scaling_policy的boto_asg.present状态,然后设置boto_cloudwatch_alarm.present状态,这些状态中的alarm_actions会引用scaling_policy。

trans-unit.source: This is different from pillar.get in that no default value can be specified. pillar.get should probably still be used in most cases to retrieve nested pillar values, as it is a bit more flexible. One reason to use this function instead of pillar.get however is when it is desirable to retrieve the values of more than one key, since pillar.get can only retrieve one key at a time.
trans-unit.target: 这与 pillar.get 不同之处在于，无法指定默认值。在大多数情况下，也许仍然可以使用 pillar.get 来检索嵌套的支柱值，因为它更具灵活性。但是，使用此功能而不使用 pillar.get 原因之一是当需要检索多个键的值时，因为 pillar.get 一次只能检索一个键。

trans-unit.source: This is not considered secure. It is recommended to instead use archive.unzip for password-protected ZIP files. If a password is used here, then the unzip command run to extract the ZIP file will not show up in the minion log like most shell commands Salt runs do. However, the password will still be present in the events logged to the minion log at the debug log level. If the minion is logging at debug (or more verbose), then be advised that the password will appear in the log.
trans-unit.target: 这不被认为是安全的。建议改用 archive.unzip 作为受密码保护的ZIP文件。如果在此使用密码，则运行解压缩ZIP文件的unzip命令将不会像大多数Salt命令运行的shell命令那样显示在minion日志中。但是，在 debug 日志级别记录到minion日志的事件中仍将提供密码。如果小兵正在 debug 记录日志（或更详细），则建议密码将出现在日志中。

trans-unit.source: This is the exit code of the invocation of PowerShell. If the final execution status (in PowerShell) of our command (with | ConvertTo-JSON appended) is False this should be non-0. Likewise if PowerShell exited with $LASTEXITCODE set to some non-0 value, then retcode will end up with this value.

trans-unit.source: This is useful for sending events directly to the master from the shell with salt-run. It is also quite useful for sending events in orchestration states where the fire_event requisite isn't sufficient because it does not support sending custom data with the event.

trans-unit.target: 这意味着，如果一个 cmd 状态被另一个状态监视，则由于该状态将始终执行正在监视的状态

trans-unit.source: This method calls create_or_update_resource() and formats the result as a salt state return value.
trans-unit.target: 该方法调用create_or_update_resource(),并将结果格式化为盐状态返回值。

trans-unit.target: 该方法调用delete_resource(),并将结果格式化为盐状态的返回值。

trans-unit.source: This method generates true random numbers from a Gaussian distribution (also known as a normal distribution).
trans-unit.target: 这种方法从高斯分布(也称为正态分布)中产生真随机数。

trans-unit.source: This method is implemented by getting all objects of the resource type (cached into __context__), then brute force searching through the list and trying to match any of the identifier_fields. The __context__ cache is purged after any create, update or delete to the resource.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法是通过获取资源类型的所有对象(缓存到__context__中)来实现的,然后在列表中进行粗暴的搜索,并尝试匹配任何标识符字段。在对资源进行任何创建、更新或删除之后,__context__缓存会被清除。

trans-unit.source: This method is mainly used to translate state sls into pagerduty id's for dependent objects. For example, a pagerduty escalation policy contains one or more schedules, which must be passed by their pagerduty id. We look up the schedules by name (using this method), and then translate the names into id's.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法主要用于将状态sls翻译成依赖对象的pagerduty id。例如,一个pagerduty升级策略包含一个或多个schedul,必须通过它们的pagerduty id来传递。我们通过名称查找计划表(使用这个方法),然后将名称翻译成id。

trans-unit.source: This method is provided for compatibility with other VM-control state modules. For Vagrant, the action is identical with stopped.
trans-unit.target: 提供此方法是为了与其他VM控制状态模块兼容。对于流浪，用动作是相同的 stopped 。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to send configuration commands to the node. It will take either a string or a list and prepend the necessary commands to put the session into config mode.

trans-unit.source: This method will create the rule if it does not exist. If the rule does exist, it will ensure that the configurations are set appropriately.
trans-unit.target: 如果规则不存在,本方法将创建规则。如果规则确实存在,它将确保配置被适当地设置。

trans-unit.source: This method will retrieve the config from the node as either a string or a list object. The config to retrieve can be specified as either the startup-config or the running-config.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法将从节点中以字符串或列表对象的形式检索config,可以指定要检索的config为启动config或运行config。检索的配置可以指定为启动配置或运行配置。

trans-unit.target: 这个模块接受连接配置的细节,可以是参数,也可以是相关minions的/etc/salt/minion中的配置设置。

trans-unit.source: This module accepts connection configuration details either as parameters, or as configuration settings in pillar as a Salt proxy. Options passed into opts will be ignored if options are passed into pillar.
trans-unit.target: 该模块接受连接配置细节,可以是参数,也可以是作为Salt代理在pillar中的配置设置。如果将选项传入opts,则会忽略传入pillar的选项。

trans-unit.source: This module accepts explicit AWS credentials but can also utilize IAM roles assigned to the instance through Instance Profiles or it can read them from the ~/.aws/credentials file or from these environment variables: AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID, AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY. Dynamic credentials are then automatically obtained from AWS API and no further configuration is necessary. More information available at:
trans-unit.target: 该模块接受明确的AWS凭证,但也可以利用通过实例配置文件分配给实例的IAM角色,也可以从~/.aws/redentials文件或这些环境变量中读取它们。AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID、AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY。然后,动态凭证会自动从AWS API中获取,无需进一步配置。更多信息请见。

trans-unit.source: This module accepts explicit AWS credentials but can also utilize IAM roles assigned to the instance through Instance Profiles. trans-unit.source: This module acts as the default package provider for FreeBSD 9 and older. If you need to use pkgng on a FreeBSD 9 system, you will need to override the pkg provider by setting the providers parameter in your Minion config file, in order to use pkgng.
trans-unit.target: 该模块充当FreeBSD 9及更早版本的默认软件包提供程序。如果需要在FreeBSD 9系统上使用pkgng，则需要通过在Minion配置文件中设置 providers 参数来覆盖 pkg provider ，以便使用pkgng。

trans-unit.source: This module allows access to Consul using an sdb:// URI
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许使用 sdb:// URI 访问Consul

trans-unit.source: This module allows access to Hashicorp Vault using an sdb:// URI.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许使用 sdb:// URI 访问Hashicorp Vault 。

trans-unit.source: This module allows access to Redis using an sdb:// URI.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许使用 sdb:// URI 访问Redis 。

trans-unit.source: This module allows access to a REST interface using an sdb:// URI.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许使用 sdb:// URI 访问REST接口。

trans-unit.source: This module allows access to environment variables using an sdb:// URI.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许使用 sdb:// URI 访问环境变量。

trans-unit.source: This module allows access to memcached using an sdb:// URI. This package is located at https://pypi.python.org/pypi/python-memcached.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许使用 sdb:// URI 访问memcached 。该软件包位于 https://pypi.python.org/pypi/python-memcached 。

trans-unit.source: This module allows access to sqlite3 using an sdb:// URI
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许使用 sdb:// URI 访问sqlite3

trans-unit.source: This module allows access to the etcd database using an sdb:// URI. This package is located at https://pypi.python.org/pypi/python-etcd.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许使用 sdb:// URI 访问etcd数据库。该软件包位于 https://pypi.python.org/pypi/python-etcd 。

trans-unit.source: This module allows access to the keyring package using an sdb:// URI. This package is located at https://pypi.python.org/pypi/keyring.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许使用 sdb:// URI 访问密钥环包。该软件包位于 https://pypi.python.org/pypi/keyring 。

trans-unit.source: This module allows configuring local group policy (i.e. gpedit.msc) on a Windows server.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许在Windows服务器上配置本地组策略（即 gpedit.msc ）。

trans-unit.source: This module allows one to deal with docker-compose file in a directory.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许人们处理目录中的docker-compose文件。

trans-unit.source: This module allows pillar data to be stored in Hashicorp Vault.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许将支柱数据存储在Hashicorp Vault中。

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to "wrap" a state's execution with concurrency control. This is useful to protect against all hosts executing highstate simultaneously if your services don't all HUP restart. The common way of protecting against this is to run in batch mode, but that doesn't protect from another person running the same batch command (and thereby having 2x the number of nodes deploying at once).
trans-unit.target: 这个模块允许你用并发控制来 "包裹 "一个状态的执行。这对于防止所有主机同时执行highstate很有用,如果你的服务没有全部hup重启。常见的保护方式是以批处理模式运行,但这并不能保护另一个人运行相同的批处理命令(从而一次部署2倍的节点数量)。

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to acquire and release a slot. This is primarily useful for ensureing that no more than N hosts take a specific action at once. This can also be used to coordinate between masters.
trans-unit.target: 这个模块可以让你获得和释放一个槽位。这主要用于确保不超过N个主机同时采取特定的行动。这也可以用来协调主控之间的关系。

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to control the power settings of a windows minion via powercfg.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许你通过powercfg控制windows minion的电源设置。

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to install certificates into the windows certificate manager.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许你在windows证书管理器中安装证书。

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to install ports using BATCH=yes to bypass configuration prompts. It is recommended to use the ports state to install ports, but it is also possible to use this module exclusively from the command line.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许您使用 BATCH=yes 安装端口以绕过配置提示。建议使用 ports state 安装端口，但是也可以从命令行专门使用此模块。

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to manage assistive access on macOS minions with 10.9+
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许您在10.9+的macOS小伙伴上管理辅助访问。

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to manage extended attributes on files or directories
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许你管理文件或目录的扩展属性。

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to manage proxy settings
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许您管理代理设置

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to manage windows licensing via slmgr.vbs
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许你通过slmgr.vbs来管理windows授权。

trans-unit.source: This module also has the ability to scan files inside an include directory, and make changes in the appropriate file.
trans-unit.target: 该模块还能够扫描include目录内的文件,并在相应的文件中进行修改。

trans-unit.source: This module applies DSC Configurations in the form of PowerShell scripts or MOF (Managed Object Format) schema files.
trans-unit.target: 本模块以PowerShell脚本或MOF(Managed Object Format)模式文件的形式应用DSC配置。

trans-unit.source: This module can be used by either passing a hook_url directly or by specifying it in a configuration profile in the salt master/minion config. For example:

trans-unit.source: This module can be used for basic configuration parsing, audit or validation for a variety of network platforms having Cisco IOS style configuration (one space indentation), including: Cisco IOS, Cisco Nexus, Cisco IOS-XR, Cisco IOS-XR, Cisco ASA, Arista EOS, Brocade, HP Switches, Dell PowerConnect Switches, or Extreme Networks devices. In newer versions, ciscoconfparse provides support for brace-delimited configuration style as well, for platforms such as: Juniper Junos, Palo Alto, or F5 Networks.
trans-unit.target: 该模块可用于具有Cisco IOS样式配置（一个空间缩进）的各种网络平台的基本配置解析，审核或验证，包括：Cisco IOS，Cisco Nexus，Cisco IOS-XR，Cisco IOS-XR，Cisco ASA ，Arista EOS，Brocade，HP交换机，Dell PowerConnect交换机或Extreme Networks设备。在较新的版本中， ciscoconfparse 还支持大括号分隔的配置样式，并支持以下平台：Juniper Junos，Palo Alto或F5 Networks。

trans-unit.source: This module can be used in Reactor System for posting data to OpsGenie as a remote-execution function.
trans-unit.target: 该模块可以在Reactor系统中使用,作为远程执行功能向OpsGenie发布数据。

trans-unit.source: This module can be used with the prereq requisite to remove/add the worker from the load balancer before deploying/restarting service.
trans-unit.target: 该模块可与使用前提条件必需删除/从负载平衡器部署/重新启动服务之前添加工人。

trans-unit.source: This module can enable managing a complete PKI infrastructure including creating private keys, CA's, certificates and CRLs. It includes the ability to generate a private key on a server, and have the corresponding public key sent to a remote CA to create a CA signed certificate. This can be done in a secure manner, where private keys are always generated locally and never moved across the network.
trans-unit.target: 该模块可以管理一个完整的PKI基础设施,包括创建私钥、CA、证书和CRL。它包括能够在服务器上生成私钥,并将相应的公钥发送到远程CA,以创建CA签名的证书。这可以以安全的方式进行,私钥总是在本地生成,从不在网络上移动。

trans-unit.source: This module can equally be used via the pyeapi Proxy module or directly from an arbitrary (Proxy) Minion that is running on a machine having access to the network device API, and the pyeapi library is installed.
trans-unit.target: 同样，可以通过 pyeapi 代理模块使用该模块，也可以直接从可访问网络设备API的计算机上运行的任意（代理）Minion中使用该模块，并安装了 pyeapi 库。

trans-unit.source: This module can equally be used via the netmiko Proxy module (check documentation), or directly from an arbitrary (Proxy) Minion that is running on a server (computer) having access to the network device, and has the netmiko library installed.
trans-unit.target: 该模块同样可以通过 netmiko 代理模块（请参阅文档）使用，也可以直接从在可访问网络设备的服务器（计算机）上运行并安装了 netmiko 库的任意（代理）Minion中使用。

trans-unit.source: This module can equally be used via the nxos_api Proxy module or directly from an arbitrary (Proxy) Minion that is running on a machine having access to the network device API. Given that there are no external dependencies, this module can very well used when using the regular Salt Minion directly installed on the switch.
trans-unit.target: 同样，可以通过 nxos_api 代理模块使用该模块，也可以直接从运行在可以访问网络设备API的计算机上的任意（代理）Minion 使用该模块。鉴于没有外部依赖关系，当使用直接安装在交换机上的常规Salt Minion时，可以很好地使用此模块。

trans-unit.source: This module can have an optional minion-level configuration in /etc/salt/minion.d/ as follows:
trans-unit.target: 本模块可以在/etc/salt/minion.d/中进行可选的minion级配置,具体如下。

trans-unit.source: This module clones the behaviour of reclass (http://reclass.pantsfullofunix.net/), without the need of an external app, and add several features to improve flexibility. Saltclass lets you define your nodes from simple yaml files (.yml) through hierarchical class inheritance with the possibility to override pillars down the tree.
trans-unit.target: 该模块无需外部应用程序即可克隆重分类行为（http://reclass.pantsfullofunix.net/），并添加了一些功能来提高灵活性。Saltclass允许您从简单 yaml 文件（ .yml ）到层次结构类继承定义节点，并可以覆盖树下的支柱。

trans-unit.source: This module currently looks for certbot script in the $PATH as - certbot, - lestsencrypt, - certbot-auto, - letsencrypt-auto eventually falls back to /opt/letsencrypt/letsencrypt-auto
trans-unit.target: 这个模块目前在$PATH中寻找certbot脚本,作为-certbot,-lestsencrypt,-certbot-auto,-letsencrypt-auto最终回到/opt/letsencrypt/letsencrypt-auto。

trans-unit.source: This module currently only supports the napalm proxy minion and assumes you will use SSH keys to authenticate to the network device. If password authentication is desired, it is recommended to create another proxy key in pillar_roots (or git_pillar) with just the passwd key and use salt.renderers.gpg to encrypt the value. If any additional options for the proxy setup are needed they should also be configured in pillar_roots.
trans-unit.target: 该模块当前仅支持napalm代理minion，并假定您将使用SSH密钥对网络设备进行身份验证。如果需要密码验证，建议仅使用 passwd 密钥在column_roots（或git_pillar）中创建另一个 proxy 密钥，并使用 salt.renderers.gpg 加密该值。如果需要用于代理设置的任何其他选项，则还应该在支柱根目录中进行配置。

trans-unit.source: This module currently requires the latest develop branch of Salt to be installed.
trans-unit.target: 该模块目前需要安装Salt的最新开发分支。

trans-unit.source: This module currently supports the CloudFlare certbot DNS plugin. The DNS plugin credentials file needs to be passed in using the dns_plugin_credentials argument.
trans-unit.target: 该模块当前支持CloudFlare certbot DNS插件。需要使用 dns_plugin_credentials 参数传递DNS插件凭据文件。

trans-unit.source: This module depends on the Python library with the same name, ciscoconfparse - to install execute: pip install ciscoconfparse.
trans-unit.target: 此模块依赖于具有相同名称 ciscoconfparse 的Python库-安装execute： pip install ciscoconfparse 。

trans-unit.source: This module does not attempt to understand or manage boot loader configurations it is possible to have a new kernel installed, but a boot loader configuration that will never activate it. For this reason, it would not be advisable to schedule this state to run automatically.
trans-unit.target: 这个模块并不试图理解或管理 Boot Loader 配置,它有可能安装了一个新的内核,但是一个永远不会激活它的 Boot Loader 配置。出于这个原因,不建议将这个状态安排为自动运行。

trans-unit.source: This module exposes most of the common nix operations. Currently not meant to be run as a pkg module, but explicitly as nix.*.
trans-unit.target: 该模块公开了大多数常见的nix操作。当前不打算作为 pkg 模块运行，而是明确地作为 nix.* 。

trans-unit.source: This module exposes the functionality of the TestInfra library for use with SaltStack in order to verify the state of your minions. In order to allow for the addition of new resource types in TestInfra this module dynamically generates wrappers for the various resources by iterating over the values in the __all__ variable exposed by the testinfra.modules namespace.
trans-unit.target: 该模块提供了与SaltStack一起使用的TestInfra库的功能，以验证您的奴才状态。为了允许在TestInfra中添加新的资源类型，该模块通过迭代testinfra.modules命名空间公开的 __all__ 变量中的值来动态生成各种资源的包装器。

trans-unit.source: This module exposes two ways of interaction with the CLI, either through commands or operations.
trans-unit.target: 本模块公开了两种与CLI交互的方式,可以通过命令或操作。

The rewrite of this module has removed all pkgng support, and moved it to the pkgng execution module. For versions <= 0.17.0, the documentation here should not be considered accurate. If your Minion is running one of these versions, then the documentation for this module can be viewed using the sys.doc function:

The documentation below should not be considered to apply to this module in versions <= 0.17.x. trans-unit.source: This module is used to install and manage python installations with pyenv. Different versions of python can be installed, and uninstalled. pyenv will be installed automatically the first time it is needed and can be updated later. This module will not automatically install packages which pyenv will need to compile the versions of python.
trans-unit.target: 该模块用于通过pyenv安装和管理python安装。可以安装和卸载不同版本的python。pyenv会在第一次需要时自动安装，以后可以更新。这个模块不会自动安装pyenv编译python版本所需的软件包。

trans-unit.source: This module is used to install and manage ruby installations and gemsets with RVM, the Ruby Version Manager. Different versions of ruby can be installed and gemsets created. RVM itself will be installed automatically if it's not present. This module will not automatically install packages that RVM depends on or ones that are needed to build ruby. If you want to run RVM as an unprivileged user (recommended) you will have to create this user yourself. This is how a state configuration could look like:
trans-unit.target: 该模块用于安装和管理RVM(Ruby版本管理器)的ruby安装和gemsets。可以安装不同版本的ruby并创建gemsets。如果RVM本身不存在,会自动安装。这个模块不会自动安装RVM所依赖的包或构建ruby所需要的包。如果你想以非特权用户的身份运行RVM(推荐),你必须自己创建这个用户。这就是一个状态配置的样子。

trans-unit.source: This module is used to install and manage ruby installations with rbenv and the ruby-build plugin. Different versions of ruby can be installed, and uninstalled. Rbenv will be installed automatically the first time it is needed and can be updated later. This module will not automatically install packages which rbenv will need to compile the versions of ruby. If your version of ruby fails to install, refer to the ruby-build documentation to verify you are not missing any dependencies: https://github.com/sstephenson/ruby-build/wiki
trans-unit.target: 该模块用于通过rbenv和ruby-build插件安装和管理ruby安装。可以安装和卸载不同版本的ruby。 Rbenv会在第一次需要时自动安装，以后可以更新。该模块不会自动安装rbenv编译ruby版本所需的软件包。如果您的ruby版本无法安装，请参考ruby-build文档以确认您没有缺少任何依赖项：https : //github.com/sstephenson/ruby-build/wiki

trans-unit.source: This module manages the installed packages using Bower. Note that npm, git and bower must be installed for this module to be available.
trans-unit.target: 这个模块使用Bower管理安装的包。请注意,这个模块必须安装npm、git和bower才能使用。

trans-unit.source: This module may be deployed on any WSGI-compliant server such as Apache with mod_wsgi or Nginx with FastCGI, to name just two (there are many).
trans-unit.target: 这个模块可以部署在任何兼容WSGI的服务器上,比如使用mod_wsgi的Apache或使用FastCGI的Nginx,仅举两个例子(还有很多)。

trans-unit.source: This module may be run via any WSGI-compliant production server such as Apache with mod_wsgi or Nginx with FastCGI.
trans-unit.target: 该模块可以通过任何兼容WSGI的生产服务器来运行,如使用mod_wsgi的Apache或使用FastCGI的Nginx。

trans-unit.source: This module needs the bcache userspace tools to function.
trans-unit.target: 该模块需要bcache用户空间工具才能运行。

trans-unit.source: This module performs the following steps to generate the software metadata database:
trans-unit.target: 该模块执行以下步骤来生成软件元数据数据库。

trans-unit.source: This module provides a collection of helper functions for Cisco IOS style configuration manipulation. This module does not have external dependencies and can be used from any Proxy or regular Minion.
trans-unit.target: 该模块为 Cisco IOS 风格的配置操作提供了一个辅助函数的集合。该模块没有外部依赖性,可以从任何 Proxy 或普通 Minion 中使用。

trans-unit.source: This module provides a custom renderer that processes a salt file with a specified templating engine (e.g. Jinja) and a chosen data renderer (e.g. YAML), extracts arguments for any stateconf.set state, and provides the extracted arguments (including Salt-specific args, such as require, etc) as template context. The goal is to make writing reusable/configurable/parameterized salt files easier and cleaner.
trans-unit.target: 该模块提供了一个自定义渲染器，该渲染器使用指定的模板引擎（例如Jinja）和选定的数据渲染器（例如YAML）处理盐文件，提取任何 stateconf.set 状态的参数，并提供提取的参数（包括特定于Salt的args） ，例如 require 等）作为模板上下文。目的是使编写可重用/可配置/参数化的盐文件变得更加轻松和整洁。

trans-unit.source: This module provides a thin wrapper around Salt's Python API. Executing a Salt command via rest_cherrypy is directly analogous to executing a Salt command via Salt's CLI (which also uses the Python API) -- they share the same semantics, performance characteristics, and 98% of the same code. As a rule-of-thumb: if you wouldn't do it at the CLI don't do it via this API.
trans-unit.target: 该模块提供了Salt的Python API的瘦包装。通过rest_cherrypy执行Salt命令直接类似于通过Salt的CLI（也使用Python API）执行Salt命令-它们共享相同的语义，性能特征以及相同代码的98％。作为一个经验法则：如果您不打算在CLI上执行此操作，请不要通过此API进行操作。

trans-unit.source: This module provides access to Salt's cache subsystem.
trans-unit.target: 该模块提供对Salt缓存子系统的访问。

trans-unit.target: 该模块提供了一个与AWS的弹性计算云(EC2)服务的接口。

trans-unit.source: This module provides support for Solaris 11 new package management - IPS (Image Packaging System). This is the default pkg module for Solaris 11 (and later).

trans-unit.source: This module provides the network state(s) on Windows hosts. DNS servers, IP addresses and default gateways can currently be managed.
trans-unit.target: 此模块提供Windows主机上的 network 状态。当前可以管理DNS服务器，IP地址和默认网关。

trans-unit.source: This module provides the ability to add/remove websites and application pools from Microsoft IIS.
trans-unit.target: 该模块提供了从Microsoft IIS中添加/删除网站和应用程序池的功能。

trans-unit.source: This module requires Azure Resource Manager credentials to be passed as a dictionary of keyword arguments to the connection_auth parameter in order to work properly. Since the authentication parameters are sensitive, it's recommended to pass them to the states via pillar.
trans-unit.target: 此模块要求将Azure Resource Manager凭据作为关键字参数的字典传递给 connection_auth 参数，以使其正常工作。由于身份验证参数是敏感的，因此建议通过支柱将其传递给状态。

trans-unit.source: This module requires Azure Resource Manager credentials to be passed as keyword arguments to every function in order to work properly.
trans-unit.target: 该模块要求Azure Resource Manager凭证作为关键字参数传递给每个函数才能正常工作。

trans-unit.source: This module requires a 'zenoss' entry in the master/minion config.
trans-unit.target: 该模块需要在master/minion配置中加入 "zenoss "条目。

trans-unit.source: This module requires a configuration profile to be configured in the minion config, minion pillar, or master config. The module will use the 'grafana' key by default, if defined.

trans-unit.source: This module requires the semanage, setsebool, and semodule commands to be available on the minion. trans-unit.target: 该模块需要redis python模块,并使用以下默认值,这些默认值可以在minion配置中被覆盖。

trans-unit.source: This module requires the use of MD5 hashing. Certain security audits may not permit the use of MD5. For those cases, this module should be disabled or removed.
trans-unit.target: 本模块需要使用MD5散列法。某些安全审计可能不允许使用MD5。在这种情况下,应禁用或删除该模块。

trans-unit.target: 这个模块应该可以用来查询其他类似S3的服务,比如Eucalyptus。

trans-unit.source: This module stores the serial in a grain, you can explicitly set the stored value as a grain named dnsserial_<zone_name>.
trans-unit.target: 此模块将序列存储在谷物中，您可以将存储的值显式设置为名为 dnsserial_<zone_name> 的谷物。

trans-unit.source: This module supports multi-core and standard setups. Certain methods are master/slave specific. Make sure you set the solr.type. If you have questions or want a feature request please ask.
trans-unit.target: 该模块支持多核和标准设置。某些方法是特定于主/从的。请确保你设置了solr.type.的方法。如果你有问题或想要一个功能请求,请提出。

trans-unit.source: This module uses boto3, which can be installed via package, or pip.
trans-unit.target: 该模块使用 boto3 ，可以通过软件包或pip进行安装。

trans-unit.source: This module uses HTTP requests to talk to the apache solr request handlers to gather information and report errors. Because of this the minion doesn't necessarily need to reside on the actual slave. However if you want to use the signal function the minion must reside on the physical solr host.
trans-unit.target: 该模块使用HTTP请求与apache solr请求处理程序对话,收集信息并报告错误。正因为如此,minion不一定需要驻留在实际的slave上。然而,如果您想使用信号功能,奴仆必须驻留在物理solr主机上。

trans-unit.source: This module uses MD5 hashing which may not be compliant with certain security audits.
trans-unit.target: 该模块使用MD5哈希,可能不符合某些安全审计的要求。

trans-unit.source: This module uses PyMongo, and accepts configuration details as parameters as well as configuration settings:
trans-unit.target: 该模块使用PyMongo,并接受配置细节作为参数以及配置设置。

trans-unit.source: This module uses a configuration profile for one or multiple Cloud providers
trans-unit.target: 该模块使用一个或多个云提供商的配置配置文件。

trans-unit.target: 这个模块使用boto,可以通过package安装,也可以通过pip安装。

trans-unit.source: This module uses boto3 behind the scenes - as a result it inherits any limitations it boto3's implementation of the AWS API. It is also designed to as directly as possible leverage boto3's parameter naming and semantics. This allows one to use http://boto3.readthedocs.io/en/latest/reference/services/elasticache.html as an excellent source for details too involved to reiterate here.
trans-unit.target: 此模块在后台使用boto3-因此，它继承了boto3对AWS API实施的所有限制。它还设计为尽可能直接利用boto3的参数命名和语义。这样一来，您就可以将http://boto3.readthedocs.io/en/latest/reference/services/elasticache.html用作出色的信息来源，因为这里涉及的细节也需要在此重申。

trans-unit.source: This module uses requests, which can be installed via package, or pip.
trans-unit.target: 这个模块使用请求,可以通过package,或者pip安装。

trans-unit.source: This module uses the requests Python module to communicate to the namecheap API.
trans-unit.target: 该模块使用 requests Python模块与namecheap API通信。

trans-unit.source: This module uses the awscli tool provided by Amazon. This can be downloaded from pip. Also check the documentation for awscli for configuration information.
trans-unit.target: 该模块使用亚马逊提供的awscli工具。这个工具可以从pip下载。也可以查看 awscli 的文档了解配置信息。

trans-unit.source: This module uses the manager webapp to manage Apache tomcat webapps. If the manager webapp is not configured some of the functions won't work.
trans-unit.target: 这个模块使用manager webapp来管理Apache tomcat webapps。如果没有配置manager webapp,一些功能将无法使用。

trans-unit.source: This module will bock while acquiring a slot, meaning that however the command gets called it will coordinate with zookeeper to ensure that no more than max_concurrency steps are executing with a single path.
trans-unit.target: 这个模块会在获取槽位的同时进行bock,也就是说无论命令如何被调用,它都会与zookeeper协调,以确保一个路径执行的步数不超过max_concurrency。

trans-unit.source: This module will decrypt PGP encrypted secrets against a tISM server.
trans-unit.target: 该模块将对tISM服务器的PGP加密秘密进行解密。

trans-unit.source: This module will enforce group membership. If a group exists and contains members this state does not include, those members will be removed and replaced with the specified members in the state.
trans-unit.target: 该模块将强制执行组成员资格。如果一个组存在,并且包含了这个状态不包含的成员,这些成员将被移除,并替换为状态中的指定成员。

trans-unit.source: This module will load a node-specific pillar dictionary from a mongo collection. It uses the node's id for lookups and can load either the whole document, or just a specific field from that document as the pillar dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 该模块将从mongo集合中加载特定节点的pillar dictionary。它使用节点的id进行查找,可以加载整个文档,也可以只加载该文档中的一个特定字段作为支柱字典。

trans-unit.source: This module will load tops data from a mongo collection. It uses the node's id for lookups.
trans-unit.target: 该模块将从mongo集合中加载tops数据。它使用节点的id进行查找。

trans-unit.source: This module will only process a single address type (ip-netmask, ip-range, or fqdn). It will process the specified value if the following order: ip-netmask, ip-range, fqdn. For proper execution, only specify a single address type.
trans-unit.target: 本模块只处理单一的地址类型(ip-netmask、ip-range或fqdn)。它将按照以下顺序处理指定的值:ip-netmask、ip-range、fqdn。为了正确执行,只能指定单一的地址类型。

trans-unit.source: This module will only return pillar data if the digicert runner module has already been used to create certificates.
trans-unit.target: 仅当已使用 digicert Runner模块创建证书时，此模块才返回支柱数据。

trans-unit.source: This module will only return pillar data if the venafi runner module has already been used to create certificates.
trans-unit.target: 如果已经使用了 venafi 运行程序模块来创建证书，则此模块仅返回支柱数据。

trans-unit.source: This module works with Cassandra v2 and v3 and hence generates queries based on the internal schema of said version.
trans-unit.target: 该模块适用于Cassandra v2和v3,因此可以根据上述版本的内部模式生成查询。

trans-unit.target: 该目录必须是具有扁平结构的目录，必须具有索引文件（可以使用 index_file 选项指定其名称）和许多TextFSM模板。

trans-unit.source: This object should be used as a context manager. It is safe to nest with statements.
trans-unit.target: 该对象应用作上下文管理器。它是安全的鸟巢 with 报表。

trans-unit.target: 这只适用于少数房产

trans-unit.source: This operation forcibly breaks any mounts of the file system via the mount target that is being deleted, which might disrupt instances or applications using those mounts. To avoid applications getting cut off abruptly, you might consider unmounting any mounts of the mount target, if feasible. The operation also deletes the associated network interface. Uncommitted writes may be lost, but breaking a mount target using this operation does not corrupt the file system itself. The file system you created remains. You can mount an EC2 instance in your VPC via another mount target.
trans-unit.target: 该操作通过被删除的挂载目标强行破坏文件系统的任何挂载,这可能会破坏使用这些挂载的实例或应用程序。为了避免应用程序被突然切断,如果可行的话,您可以考虑取消挂载目标的任何挂载。该操作还将删除相关的网络接口。未提交的写入可能会丢失,但使用此操作破坏挂载目标不会破坏文件系统本身。您创建的文件系统仍然存在。您可以通过另一个挂载目标挂载VPC中的EC2实例。

trans-unit.source: This option behaves differently depending on whether or not all is set to True. If it is, then all values matching the regex will be deleted (this is the only way to delete multiple values from a multivar). If all is set to False, then this state will fail if the regex matches more than one value in a multivar.
trans-unit.target: 该选项的行为取决于是否 all 都设置为 True 。如果是，那么将删除所有与正则表达式匹配的值（这是从multivar中删除多个值的唯一方法）。如果 all 都设置为 False ，则如果正则表达式匹配multivar中的多个值，则此状态将失败。

trans-unit.source: This option can lead to data loss or a corrupted file system. Use this option only as a last resort to detach a volume from a failed instance. The instance will not have an opportunity to flush file system caches nor file system meta data. If you use this option, you must perform file system check and repair procedures.
trans-unit.target: 该选项可能导致数据丢失或文件系统损坏。只有在万不得已的情况下,才使用该选项从失败的实例中分离卷。实例将没有机会刷新文件系统缓存或文件系统元数据。如果使用此选项,必须执行文件系统检查和修复程序。

trans-unit.source: This option cannot be reliably managed on CentOS 7. This is because while support for this option was added in API version 1.24, its value was not added to the inpsect results until API version 1.26. The version of Docker which is available for CentOS 7 runs API version 1.24, meaning that while Salt can pass this argument to the API, it has no way of knowing the value of this config option in an existing Docker network.
trans-unit.target: 这个选项在CentOS 7上不能被可靠地管理。这是因为虽然在API 1.24版本中增加了对这个选项的支持,但它的值直到API 1.26版本才被添加到inpsect结果中。CentOS 7可用的Docker版本运行的是API 1.24版本,这意味着虽然Salt可以将这个参数传递给API,但它无法知道现有Docker网络中这个配置选项的值。

trans-unit.source: This option has been deprecated and removed in pip version 7.0.0. Please use index_url and/or extra_index_url instead.
trans-unit.target: 此选项已在pip版本7.0.0中弃用并删除。请改用 index_url 和/或 extra_index_url 。

trans-unit.source: This option modifies the behavior of traffic_line -b and traffic_line -L such that traffic_server is not shut down until the number of active client connections drops to the number given by the proxy.config.restart.active_client_threshold configuration variable.
trans-unit.target: 这个选项修改了traffic_line -b和traffic_line -L的行为,使traffic_server不会被关闭,直到活动的客户端连接数下降到proxy.config.restart.active_client_threshold配置变量给出的数量。

trans-unit.target: 这个选项需要通过两次提交。

trans-unit.target: 除非将新的CLI参数添加到git-merge-base（1）并且在Salt中尚不支持，否则该选项应该不是必需的。

trans-unit.source: This option starts a new thread for each queued state run, so use this option sparingly.
trans-unit.target: 这个选项为每个排队状态运行启动一个新的线程,所以要少用这个选项。

trans-unit.source: This option will be disregarded unless the ppa argument is present.
trans-unit.target: 除非存在 ppa 参数，否则将忽略此选项。

trans-unit.source: This option will enforce a single directory at the top level of the source archive, to prevent extracting a 'tar-bomb'. Set this argument to False to allow archives with files (or multiple directories) at the top level to be extracted.
trans-unit.target: 此选项将在源档案的顶层强制执行一个目录，以防止提取“ tar炸弹”。将此参数设置为 False 可以提取具有顶层文件（或多个目录）的档案。

trans-unit.source: This option will only be set if type is also specified as io1.
trans-unit.target: 仅当 type 也指定为 io1 时,才设置此选项。

trans-unit.source: This option will only return remote branches of which the local checkout is aware, use git.fetch to update remotes.
trans-unit.target: 此选项将仅返回本地签出已知的远程分支，请使用 git.fetch 更新远程。

trans-unit.source: This option will reduce the number of connections that must be present for the proxy server. It will only require a connection to the Panorama server.

trans-unit.target: 该代理奴才使VMware ESXi(以下简称为 "ESXi")主机能够像盐奴才一样被单独对待。

trans-unit.source: This roster module allows you dynamically generate the roster from the terraform resources defined with the Terraform Salt provider.
trans-unit.target: 该名册模块使您可以根据Terraform Salt提供程序定义的地形资源动态生成名册。

trans-unit.source: This roster requires that the minion in question was created using at least the 2015.5.0 version of Salt Cloud. Starting with the 2015.5.0 release, Salt Cloud maintains an index of minions that it creates and deletes. This index tracks the provider and profile configuration used to provision the minion, including authentication information. So long as this configuration remains current, it can be used by Salt SSH to log into any minion in the index.
trans-unit.target: 该名册要求相关奴才至少是使用2015.5.0版本的盐云创建的。从2015.5.0版本开始,Salt Cloud会维护其创建和删除的奴仆的索引。该索引可跟踪用于供应奴仆的提供商和配置文件配置,包括验证信息。只要该配置保持当前状态,就可以被Salt SSH用于登录索引中的任何奴仆。

trans-unit.target: 本名册支持盐师的所有匹配和目标。匹配时只使用盐师的缓存。

trans-unit.source: This routine is called from the file.managed state to pull a hash from a remote file. Regular expressions are used line by line on the source_hash file, to find a potential candidate of the indicated hash type. This avoids many problems of arbitrary file layout rules. It specifically permits pulling hash codes from debian *.dsc files.
trans-unit.target: 从 file.managed 状态调用此例程，以从远程文件中提取哈希。在 source_hash 文件中逐行使用正则表达式，以查找指定哈希类型的潜在候选对象。这避免了任意文件布局规则的许多问题。它特别允许从debian *.dsc 文件中提取哈希码。

trans-unit.source: This should not need to be used in most cases. By default, Salt will try to use the encoding detected from the system locale, and will fall back to UTF-8 if this fails. This should only need to be used in cases where the output of the command is encoded in something other than the system locale or UTF-8.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下不需要使用这个选项。默认情况下,Salt会尝试使用从系统语言中检测到的编码,如果失败,则会回到UTF-8编码。只有当命令的输出是用系统语言或UTF-8以外的编码时,才需要使用这个选项。

trans-unit.source: This state accepts the same arguments as docker_container.running, with the exception of watch_action, start, and shutdown_timeout (though the force argument has a different meaning in this state).
trans-unit.target: 该状态接受与 docker_container.running 相同的参数，但 watch_action ， start 和 shutdown_timeout 除外（尽管 force 参数在此状态下具有不同的含义）。

trans-unit.source: This state allows arbitrary python code to be executed through the condition parameter which is literally evaluated within the state. Please use caution.
trans-unit.target: 该状态允许通过条件参数执行任意的python代码,该条件参数在该状态中被真实地评估。请谨慎使用。

trans-unit.source: This state allows configuring local Windows Group Policy
trans-unit.target: 此状态允许配置本地Windows组策略

trans-unit.source: This state allows for grains to be set.
trans-unit.target: 这种状态下,可以对谷物进行设置。

trans-unit.source: This state allows you to update a system without specifying a specific update to apply. All matching updates will be installed.
trans-unit.target: 此状态允许您更新系统,而无需指定要应用的特定更新。所有匹配的更新都将被安装。

trans-unit.source: This state checks the mon daemons are in quorum. It does not alter the cluster but can be used in formula as a dependency for many cluster operations.
trans-unit.target: 该状态检查mon守护者是否处于法定人数中。它不会改变集群,但可以在公式中作为许多集群操作的依赖。

trans-unit.source: This state creates a private key then requests a certificate signed by ca according to the www policy.
trans-unit.target: 这个状态下会创建一个私钥,然后根据www策略请求ca签名的证书。

trans-unit.source: This state creates the CA key, certificate and signing policy. It also publishes the certificate to the mine where it can be easily retrieved by other minions.
trans-unit.target: 这个状态会创建CA密钥、证书和签名策略。它还将证书发布到矿场,在那里它可以很容易地被其他小伙伴检索到。

trans-unit.source: This state does not enforce the existence of the named container, it just freezes the container if it is running. To ensure that the named container exists, use lxc.present.
trans-unit.target: 此状态不会强制指定容器的存在，只会冻结容器（如果正在运行）。要确保命名容器存在，请使用 lxc.present 。

trans-unit.source: This state does not enforce the existence of the named container, it just starts the container if it is not running. To ensure that the named container exists, use lxc.present.
trans-unit.target: 此状态不会强制指定容器的存在，如果容器未运行，它只会启动容器。要确保命名容器存在，请使用 lxc.present 。

trans-unit.source: This state does not enforce the existence of the named container, it just stops the container if it running or frozen. To ensure that the named container exists, use lxc.present, or use the lxc.absent state to ensure that the container does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 此状态不会强制指定容器的存在，只会在容器运行或冻结时停止它。要确保指定的容器存在，请使用 lxc.present 或使用 lxc.absent 状态以确保该容器不存在。

trans-unit.source: This state does not install any patches. It only compares the running kernel version number to other kernel versions also installed in the system. If the running version is not the latest one installed, this state will reboot the system.
trans-unit.target: 这个状态不安装任何补丁。它只是将正在运行的内核版本号与系统中安装的其他内核版本进行比较。如果运行中的版本不是最新安装的版本,这个状态将重启系统。

trans-unit.source: This state downloads artifacts from artifactory.
trans-unit.target: 这个状态是从artifactory下载工件。

trans-unit.source: This state exists to support special handling of the watchrequisite. It should not be called directly.
trans-unit.target: 存在此状态以支持对 watch 必要条件的特殊处理。不应直接调用它。

trans-unit.source: This state function has been disabled, as it did not conform to design guidelines. Specifically, due to the fact that lxc.set_password uses chpasswd(8) to set the password, there was no method to make this action idempotent (in other words, the password would be changed every time). This makes this state redundant, since the following state will do the same thing:
trans-unit.target: 此状态功能已被禁用，因为它不符合设计准则。具体来说，由于 lxc.set_password 使用 chpasswd(8) 设置密码，因此没有方法使该操作成为幂等（换句话说，每次都会更改密码）。这使该状态变得多余，因为以下状态将执行相同的操作：

trans-unit.source: This state is intended for use from the Salt Master. It provides access to sending commands down to minions as well as access to executing master-side modules. These state functions wrap Salt's Python API.

trans-unit.source: This state module relies on the dracr.py execution module, which runs racadm commands on the chassis, blades, etc. The racadm command runs very slowly and, depending on your state, the proxy minion return might timeout before the racadm commands have completed. If you are repeatedly seeing minions timeout after state calls, please use the -t CLI argument to increase the timeout variable.

trans-unit.source: This state supports all arguments for network and IPAM pool configuration which are available for the release of docker-py installed on the minion. For that reason, the arguments described below in the NETWORK CONFIGURATION and IP ADDRESS MANAGEMENT (IPAM) sections may not accurately reflect what is available on the minion. The docker.get_client_args function can be used to check the available arguments for the installed version of docker-py (they are found in the network_config and ipam_config sections of the return data), but Salt will not prevent a user from attempting to use an argument which is unsupported in the release of Docker which is installed. In those cases, network creation be attempted but will fail.
trans-unit.target: 该状态支持所有用于网络和IPAM池配置的参数，这些参数可用于安装在奴才上的docker-py发行版。因此，下面在“ 网络配置和IP地址管理（IPAM）”部分中描述的参数可能无法准确反映小服务器上的可用参数。该 docker.get_client_args 功能可用于检查泊坞窗-PY的安装版本可用的参数（他们在被发现 network_config 和 ipam_config 部分返回数据），但Salt不会阻止用户尝试使用已安装的Docker版本中不支持的参数。在这些情况下，将尝试创建网络，但将失败。

trans-unit.source: This state supports networks with either IPv4, or both IPv4 and IPv6. If configuring IPv4, then you can pass the IPAM pool arguments below as individual arguments. However, if configuring IPv4 and IPv6, the arguments must be passed as a list of dictionaries, in the ipam_pools argument (click here for some examples). These docs also have more information on these arguments.
trans-unit.target: 此状态支持具有IPv4或IPv4和IPv6的网络。如果配置IPv4，则可以将下面的IPAM池参数作为单独的参数传递。但是，如果配置IPv4和IPv6，则必须在 ipam_pools 参数中将参数作为字典列表传递（单击此处以获取示例）。这些文档还提供了有关这些参数的更多信息。

trans-unit.source: This will not fast-forward the git_pillar cachedir on the master. All it does is perform a git fetch. If this runner is executed with -l debug, you may see a log message that says that the repo is up-to-date. Keep in mind that Salt automatically fetches git_pillar repos roughly every 60 seconds (or whatever loop_interval is set to). So, it is possible that the repo was fetched automatically in the time between when changes were pushed to the repo, and when this runner was executed. When in doubt, simply refresh pillar data using saltutil.refresh_pillar and then use pillar.item to check if the pillar data has changed as expected.
trans-unit.target: 这不会在主节点上快速转发git_pillar cachedir。它所做的就是执行 git fetch 。如果使用 -l debug 执行该运行程序，则可能会看到一条日志消息，指出该存储库是最新的。请记住，Salt大约每60秒会自动获取git_pillar仓库（或设置为 loop_interval 的任何内容）。因此，在将更改推送到存储库和执行该运行程序之间的时间中，可能会自动获取存储库。如有疑问，只需使用 saltutil.refresh_pillar 刷新支柱数据，然后使用 pillar.item 来检查支柱数据是否已按预期进行了更改。

trans-unit.source: This will decrypt on the minion side, so the specified renderer must be set up on the minion for this to work. Alternatively, pillar data can be decrypted master-side. For more information, see the Pillar Encryption documentation. Pillar data that is decrypted master-side, is not decrypted until the end of pillar compilation though, so minion-side decryption will be necessary if the encrypted pillar data must be made available in an decrypted state pillar/ext_pillar rendering.
trans-unit.target: 这将在小工具端进行解密，因此必须在小工具上设置指定的渲染器，此工具才能正常工作。可替代地，支柱数据可以在主侧被解密。有关更多信息，请参见“ 支柱加密”文档。但是，在主端编译结束之前不会解密被解密的主端数据，因此，如果必须在已解密状态的POINT / EXT_PILLAR渲染中使加密后的支柱数据可用，则必须进行奴才端解密。

trans-unit.source: This will delete a key from etcd. If the key exists then changes will be returned and thus you can watch for changes on the state, if the key does not exist then no changes will occur.
trans-unit.target: 这将从 etcd 中删除一个键。如果键存在,那么变化将被返回,因此你可以观察状态的变化,如果键不存在,则不会发生变化。

trans-unit.source: This will enforce the exact match of the rule. For example, if the rule is currently configured with the log-end option, but this option is not specified in the state method, it will be removed and reset to the system default.
trans-unit.target: 这将强制执行规则的精确匹配。例如,如果规则当前配置了日志结束选项,但该选项没有在状态方法中指定,那么它将被删除并重置为系统默认值。

trans-unit.source: This works on any platform, regardless if they have or don't have native capabilities to confirming a commit. However, please be very cautious when using this feature: on Junos (as it is the only NAPALM core platform supporting this natively) it executes a commit confirmed as you would do from the command line. All the other platforms don't have this capability natively, therefore the revert is done via Salt. That means, your device needs to be reachable at the moment when Salt will attempt to revert your changes. Be cautious when pushing configuration changes that would prevent you reach the device.
trans-unit.target: 无论它们是否具有确认提交的本机功能，它都可以在任何平台上使用。但是，使用此功能时请非常小心：在Junos（因为它是唯一本地支持此功能的NAPALM核心平台）上，它执行的确认提交与您在命令行中所做的一样。所有其他平台本身都不具备此功能，因此还原是通过Salt完成的。这意味着，当Salt将尝试还原您的更改时，您的设备需要可以访问。推送配置更改时要小心，以免影响设备。

trans-unit.source: To perform the association, the VPC and the private hosted zone must already exist. You can't convert a public hosted zone into a private hosted zone. If you want to associate a VPC from one AWS account with a zone from a another, the AWS account owning the hosted zone must first submit a CreateVPCAssociationAuthorization (using create_vpc_association_authorization() or by other means, such as the AWS console). With that done, the account owning the VPC can then call associate_vpc_with_hosted_zone() to create the association.
trans-unit.target: 要执行关联,VPC和私有托管区必须已经存在。您不能将公共托管区转换为私有托管区。如果您要将一个 AWS 帐户的 VPC 与另一个帐户的区域进行关联,拥有托管区域的 AWS 帐户必须首先提交 CreateVPCAssociationAuthorization(使用 create_vpc_association_authorization()或通过其他方式,如 AWS 控制台)。完成后,拥有VPC的账户就可以调用associate_vpc_with_hosted_zone()来创建关联。

trans-unit.source: To preserve the changes, set commit to False (either as CLI argument, either as state parameter). trans-unit.source: To use pygit2 for GitFS requires a minimum pygit2 version of 0.20.3. pygit2 0.20.3 requires libgit2 0.20.0. pygit2 and libgit2 are developed alongside one another, so it is recommended to keep them both at the same major release to avoid unexpected behavior. For example, pygit2 0.21.x requires libgit2 0.21.x, pygit2 0.22.x will require libgit2 0.22.x, etc.
trans-unit.target: 要在GitFS上使用pygit2，最低pygit2版本必须为0.20.3。pygit2 0.20.3需要libgit2 0.20.0。pygit2和libgit2是彼此并存的，因此建议将它们都保留在相同的主要版本中，以免发生意外行为。例如，pygit2 0.21.x要求libgit2 0.21.x，pygit2 0.22.x要求libgit2 0.22.x，依此类推。

trans-unit.source: To use a file from the minion cache start from the local winrepo root (C:\salt\var\cache\salt\minion\files\base\win\repo-ng). If you have .sls files organized in subdirectories you'll have to denote them with .. For example, if you have a test directory in the winrepo root with a gvim.sls file inside, would target that file like so: test.gvim. Directories can be targeted as well as long as they contain an init.sls inside. For example, if you have a node directory with an init.sls inside, target that like so: node.
trans-unit.target: 要使用Minion缓存中的文件，请从本地Winrepo根目录（ C:\salt\var\cache\salt\minion\files\base\win\repo-ng ）开始。如果您将 .sls 文件组织在子目录中，则必须使用来表示它们 . 。例如，如果您在winrepo根目录中有一个 test 目录，其中包含一个 gvim.sls 文件，则将目标文件 test.gvim ：test.gvim。只要目录中包含 init.sls ，就可以将目录作为目标。例如，如果您的 node 目录中包含 init.sls ，则将其目标定位为： node 。
